formula: (1/2) * Sum((n+k+2)!/((n-k)!*k!*2^k),k=0..n) (with a different offset).Recurrence: (n-1)^2 * a(n) = (2*n-1)*(n^2 - n + 1)*a(n-1) + n^2*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 22 2015a(n) ~ 2^(n+1/2) * n^(n+1) / exp(n-1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 22 2015
maple: (As in A001497 define:) f := proc(n) option remember; if n <=1 then (1+x)^n else expand((2*n-1)*x*f(n-1)+f(n-2)); fi; end;[seq( subs(x=1,diff(f(n),x)),n=0..60)];f2:=proc(n) local k; add((n+k+2)!/((n-k)!*k!*2^k),k=0..n); end; [seq(f2(n),n=0..60)]; # uses a different offset
